text: if you ever say anything about what you
have seen or done that will be treason
and you will have to pay for it probably
with your life

well I really knew nothing about them
and I rather liked their uniforms it was
just terrible really to join something
cuz you're like the univille I had no
idea but they were sending saboteurs
over to France and I certainly didn't
know that they were involved with SOE my
job wasn't a dangerous job at all but it
was very I had to be very careful
because at one mistake and someone's
life could be in danger
[Music]
the ones that went over there they they
had sometimes suffered terribly many of
them of course didn't come back
many of them are tortured they never
gave it away I don't think any woman
agent from sa we ever came anything away
that mattered they wanted us to go
behind the lines the German lines well
we all suggest we would go and we sat
and waited and waited and waited and
nothing happened I mean one day they
came in to us and said Eisenhower has
said he'll take the men but he will not
have the women on his conscience because
he said I don't think any of them will
come back three more furious we really
did feel we wanted to fight the Germans
because we were being bombed by them
many of our friends been killed by them
and we really did want to fight them I
wanted to get win the war my main thing
was to win the war
you
and so I asked Wade back and I would run
it myself as a charitable Hospital and
we started them the first hospice in
Europe for people with AIDS and ended up
by being the biggest as well
the stigma was terrible we had bottles
thrown through the windows
we had people wouldn't go into taxis
unless it was all hosed down and then of
course we had Princess Diana who came
who wanna change everything
I woke up in the middle one night and
thought you're being caring for people
with AIDS for 20 years it's about time
to do something to prevent the disease
and I spent the whole rest of the night
trying to work out the best way and I
ended up with the fact that should be
education through modern technology and
we are working all over the world and
aren't reaching millions of people I've
just thought about for something to be
done I'll do it I suspect it's the way I
was brought up
